abstract: Big East officials said that no invitations to potential new members had been issued despite multiple reports to the contrary.
snippet: Big East officials said that no invitations to potential new members had been issued despite multiple reports to the contrary.
lead_paragraph: Big East officials spent much of Saturday trying to fend off erroneous media reports regarding the league's expansion. They said that no invitations to potential new members had been issued despite multiple reports to the contrary.

headline.main: Big East Says It Hasn't Invited Anyone, Yet
